title: Caught Offside: Firm handshake
description:
On this week's pod, we break down a wildly entertaining draw between Tottenham and Chelsea, discuss a stunning 4-0 defeat for Manchester United and analyze Arsenal's hot start. Plus, Jack Pitt-Brooke joins to share some of his early season thoughts as well.

itunes:subtitle: Caught Offside: Battle of the Bridge Part II, United rock bottom, Arsenal's hot start
